Michael Bazos

Software Engineer, Architect & Engineering Manager

Results-driven Software Architect and Engineering Manager with extensive experience leading diverse engineering teams to deliver scalable, high-performance systems. Expert in Java, cloud technologies, and modern development practices, with a proven track record of driving business growth and technical innovation.

Summary of Qualifications

  • • Delivered consistent business growth through technical leadership, driving 20%+ quarterly growth for Priceline's rental car services while managing high-volume APIs serving millions of requests
  • • Led enterprise cloud migration initiatives, training 15+ teams across multiple languages (Java, JS, PHP, Go) to successfully transition applications from on-premises to GCP
  • • Championing AI-assisted development practices and building custom tooling to enhance team productivity, including organizing internal AI hackathons focused on customer-facing applications
  • • Deep expertise in Java and JVM technologies, with proven ability to rapidly adopt emerging technologies from cloud-native architectures (Kubernetes, Docker) to machine learning integration
  • • Architect and maintain shared components and libraries used organization-wide, ensuring consistency and best practices across engineering teams
  • • Lead the JVM developer group at Priceline, fostering collaboration and knowledge sharing across teams on JVM technologies and best practices
  • • Strong technical communicator who actively mentors engineers and creates comprehensive documentation including design documents and architectural diagrams
  • • Spearheaded introduction of machine learning for search optimization and implemented advanced caching strategies to enhance system performance
